effect.diamond_pearl: electric moves inflict half damage, regardless of target. If the user leaves the field, this effect ends.
effect.platinum: electric moves inflict half damage, regardless of target. If the user leaves the field, this effect ends.
effect.heartgold_soulsilver: electric moves inflict half damage, regardless of target. If the user leaves the field, this effect ends.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The user covers itself with mud. It weakens Electric- type moves while the user is in the battle.
flavor_text.platinum: The user covers itself with mud. It weakens Electric- type moves while the user is in the battle.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: The user covers itself with mud. It weakens Electric- type moves while the user is in the battle.
